tool_description: The Australia Geo API simplifies location-related operations in Australia by providing geocoding, reverse geocoding, distance calculation, and directions functionality. Developers can integrate this API into their applications to enhance geographic data retrieval and spatial analysis for Australian locations.
name: The Australia Geo API
title: The Australia Geo API

api_list.name: Directions between 2 Locations
api_list.description: This endpoint retrieves directions between two locations based on their latitude and longitude coordinates using the OSRM API. It provides step-by-step instructions, distance, and duration for each step of the route.

required_parameters.name: end_lon
required_parameters.description: The longitude coordinate of the ending location.

required_parameters.name: end_lat
required_parameters.description: The latitude coordinate of the ending location.

required_parameters.name: start_lat
required_parameters.description: The latitude coordinate of the starting location.

required_parameters.name: start_lon
required_parameters.description: The longitude coordinate of the starting location.

optional_parameters.name: unit
optional_parameters.description: The unit of measurement for the distance (supported units: \"**km**\", \"**mi**\").

api_list.name: Calculate Distance Reverse
api_list.description: This endpoint calculates the distance between two locations based on their addresses using the OpenStreetMap Nominatim API and the OSRM API. The distance can be returned in different units such as kilometers (**km**), miles (**mi**), feet (**ft**), or yards (**yd**).

required_parameters.name: stop_address
required_parameters.description: The stop address for the distance calculation.

required_parameters.name: start_address
required_parameters.description: The start address for the distance calculation.
required_parameters.default: Council of the City of Sydney

optional_parameters.name: unit
optional_parameters.description: The unit of measurement for the distance (supported units: "**km**", "**mi**", "**ft**", "**yd**").

api_list.name: Calculate Distance
api_list.description: This endpoint calculates the distance between two locations based on their latitude and longitude coordinates. It returns the distance and duration of the route between the locations in the specified unit of measurement.

required_parameters.name: lon2
required_parameters.description: The longitude coordinate of the second location.

required_parameters.name: lon1
required_parameters.description: The longitude coordinate of the first location.

required_parameters.name: lat1
required_parameters.description: The latitude coordinate of the first location.

required_parameters.name: lat2
required_parameters.description: The latitude coordinate of the second location.

optional_parameters.name: unit
optional_parameters.description: The unit of measurement for the distance (supported units: "**km**", "**mi**", "**ft**", "**yd**").

api_list.name: Facilities Lookup
api_list.description: This endpoint retrieves facilities in Australia based on the provided parameters. It returns a list of facilities with their details such as display name, latitude, longitude, address, post code, and more.

required_parameters.name: state
required_parameters.description: The state in Australia to filter the search.

required_parameters.name: type
required_parameters.description: The type of facility to search for.

optional_parameters.name: city
optional_parameters.description: The city in Australia to filter the search.

optional_parameters.name: limit
optional_parameters.description: The maximum number of results to return.

api_list.name: Geocode Reverse
api_list.description: This endpoint performs reverse geocoding by providing latitude and longitude coordinates. It returns the address information for the specified location, including city, state, country, amenity type, and more.

required_parameters.name: lat
required_parameters.description: The latitude coordinate of the location.

required_parameters.name: lon
required_parameters.description: The longitude coordinate of the location.

api_list.name: Search
api_list.description: This endpoint allows you to search for facilities in Australia based on the facility name or search query. It returns a list of facilities with their details such as display name, latitude, longitude, address, post code, and more.

required_parameters.name: name
required_parameters.description: The name of the facility to search for.

optional_parameters.name: limit
optional_parameters.description: The maximum number of results to return.

api_list.name: Geocode
api_list.description: This endpoint allows users to search for a specific location in Australia based on an address query.

required_parameters.name: address
required_parameters.description: The address to search for in Australia.
